20101223161143.000|20101223161146.000|TR0|saving overall, we are saving quite a bit, 
20101223161146.000|20101223161148.000|TR0|5.3 percent these days, compared to about

20101223163609.000|20101223163612.000|TR0|York Stock Exchange. It happens on 
20101223163612.000|20101223163614.000|TR0|Christmas Eve, the last day of trading,
